term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - branched chain in polymers
term.title: branched chain

item.text: A chain with at least one branch point intermediate between the boundary units.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2287. 'Glossary of basic terms in polymer science (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2293 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122287)
